name: 2002-03 Detroit Pistons Quiz | NBA Teams | 10 Questions

questions.text: How many total wins did the Pistons rack up in the 01-02 and 02-03 seasons?
questions.explanation:
100.

	Rick Carlisle led them to back to back 50 win seasons. Then he was fired after leading the team to the conferance finals.

questions.text: Who led the team in scoring during the 02-03 playoffs?
questions.explanation:
Rip Hamilton.

	Rip led the team in scoring during the regular and post seasons. In his first season in Detroit, he scored 1612 points or an average of 19.7 per game in the regular season, and 383 points in the playoffs for an average of 22.5 per game.

questions.text: Was Danny Manning was a number one overall pick?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Danny Manning went number one to the Clippers in 1988. He has also played for the Hawks, Bucks, Jazz, Suns, and Mavericks. The Pistons were his 7th NBA team. He was also traded to the Magic but never played a game for them.

questions.text: Did Ben Wallace lead the league in rebounds and blocked shots in 02-03?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Ben was defensive player of the year, however he led the league in only rebounds in the season. In 01-02, he led the league in both.

questions.text: Tayshaun Prince was one of the Pistons rookies in the 02-03 season.  Who was the other?
questions.explanation:
Memhet Okur.

	Rebraca and Sanchez were second year players. Reid spent the year on the injured list and was in his second tour of duty for the Pistons.

questions.text: Did the Pistons have the number two overall pick in the 03' draft?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	They got the pick to complete the Otis Thorpe trade with Memphis.

questions.text: Who were the team co-captains in 02-03?
questions.explanation:
Ben Wallace, Michael Curry.

	Big Ben and Michael Curry were the co-captains and have been for three years. Rip Hamilton lead the team in scoring but is not a captain. Chauncey Billups is in his first year with the team.

questions.text: Who started the most games at Center for the Pistons in 02-03?
questions.explanation:
Cliff Robinson.

	Cliff started at center and Ben at Power Forward, even though Ben was the starting center for the all-star team.

questions.text: Ben Wallace play for 3 NBA teams before coming to the Pistons?
questions.explanation:
False.

	He played in Washington, Orlando and Detroit. The Pistons was his third NBA team.
